title: Don't Cry Baby
original_name: ドント・クライ・ベイビィ
sinopse:
Takarai was demoted and started dealing with vets. A simple teasing caused Toudou-sensei to take special care of him. Toudou-sensei saw through Takarai's wounds and hoped that Takarai could accept his confession. Could Takarai let go of his sad past?

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)
